general.User has no rights for this entity: User has no rights for this entity.
general.User has no rights for this service: User has no rights for this service.
general.Unauthorized: User is not logged in or the access token has expired.

username or password.NotExist: The username or password is incorrect.

idea.Exist: The idea has already been submitted.

taskId.NotValid: The task is no longer active.
The task is no longer active.

join.codeInvalid: Sorry, the provided code is invalid.

browserKey.NotExist: Sorry, the provided code is invalid.

sessionKey.NotExist: Sorry, the provided code is invalid.

ideaFilter.syncActiveMessage: Synchronization of the filter settings with the public screen enabled
ideaFilter.syncDeactivateMessage: Synchronization of the filter settings with the public screen disabled

facilitatorSettings.info: insert the email address of a desired co author
facilitatorSettings.allowAnonymous: allow everyone to view public screen

taskSettings.info: Modules are the place where all the interaction happens.
taskSettings.preview-info: This data serves as input for the module.
taskSettings.title: Title
taskSettings.question: Question
taskSettings.questionExample: e.g. What should be the name of our new app?
taskSettings.descriptionExample: e.g. The purpose of the meeting is to come up with new ideas our new app.
taskSettings.moduleSearch: type in a search module name

sessionSettings.info: The session is the place that bundles all information belonging to your brainstorming adventure.
sessionSettings.title: Title
sessionSettings.descriptionExample: e.g. The purpose of the meeting is to come up with new ideas our new app.
sessionSettings.topicsInfo: Topics help to make a clear distinction between subjects that should have separate brainstorming modules. Tip: Keep it simple - one or two topics are usually enough!

overview.clonePrompt: Do you really want to clone this session?

processTimeline.activatePublicScreen: display this content on the public screen
processTimeline.changePublicScreen: display this item on the public screen
processTimeline.activateParticipant: activate this item for the participants
processTimeline.changeOrder: change the order of the items

taskTimeline.activatePublicScreen: display this topic on the public screen
taskTimeline.changePublicScreen: display this task on the public screen
taskTimeline.activateParticipant: activate this task for the participants
taskTimeline.changeOrder: change the order of the tasks

login.info: Go ahead and login to access all your existing resources create new brainstorming sessions.

register.info: Go ahead and create an account if you want to use our great brainstorming tool.

login.confirmSend: Confirmation email has been sent. Please also check your junk mail folder in case the mail does not appear.

register.info: Please enter your personal info to create an account.

login.info:
If you already have an account, just go ahead and login to access all
 your existing resources.

register.prototypeKeyInfo: This is a prototype. You need the prototype key to test the application in this state.

confirmEmail.thanks: Thank you for confirming your email. Follow the link to login.
confirmEmail.failed: The token for confirmation is wrong.

resetPassword.info: If you have forgotten your password, enter your email here and we will send you a link to reset your password.
resetPassword.mailSend: Reset email has been sent. Please also check your junk mail folder in case the mail does not appear.

join.info: Just enter the code your moderator provided and you’re ready to go!
join.browserKeyInfo: Your last individual connections have been saved. You can rejoin past sessions if the sessions are still open for participation by selecting them from the list. If you want to join a new session, please enter the new session PIN.
join.nicknameEntry: Enter a nickname fewer than 16 characters.

imageUploader.uploadText: Drop file here or click to upload
imageUploader.clipboardInfo: To be able to paste images from the clipboard, you must allow the page to access the clipboard, otherwise this feature will be disabled.
imageUploader.clipboardInfoTitle: Allow paste images from the clipboard

home.info: Spacehuddle takes a new approach to brainstorming with multiple people. For creating new brainstorming sessions, use the Moderator tool. You can then join an existing brainstorming session via the session code.

notFound.info: Sorry, this page does either not exist, or you are not authorized to access it.

sessionOverview.add: click this button to create your first session

sessionDetails.addTopic: A session can consist of several topics. Click this button to create your first topic.
sessionDetails.selectTopic: A session can consist of several topics. Click this to display the details of the topic.
sessionDetails.changeOrder: Change the order of the topics by drag and drop.
sessionDetails.connectionCode: Participants can connect to this session with this code.
sessionDetails.shareCode: Share the code by sending an invitation to all participants.

topicDetails.taskType: You can define tasks of different types. Tasks build on each other and serve as input for further tasks. The starting point is brainstorming. By creating a first brainstorming task, the greyed-out tasks become available.
topicDetails.addTask: A topic can consist of several tasks. Click this button to create your first task.
topicDetails.selectTask: A topic can consist of several tasks. Click this to display the details of the task.

processTimeline.activatePublicScreen: activate this switch to display this content on the public screen
processTimeline.changePublicScreen: move the slider to change the item on the public screen
processTimeline.activateParticipant: click on the cellphone to activate this item for the participants
processTimeline.changeOrder: change the order of the items by drag and drop along the timeline
processTimeline.selectItem: click on the item title to display the item details
processTimeline.showNullPublicScreen: set the public screen slider to this position to display overview on the public screen
processTimeline.publicScreenForOtherTopic: The Public Screen is assigned to a different topic. By clicking on this switch, the overview can be activated on the public screen.

taskTimeline.activatePublicScreen: activate this switch to display this topic on the public screen
taskTimeline.changePublicScreen: move the slider to change the task on the public screen
taskTimeline.activateParticipant: click on the cellphone to activate this task for the participants
taskTimeline.changeOrder: change the order of the tasks by drag and drop along the timeline
taskTimeline.selectItem: click on the task title to display the task details
taskTimeline.showNullPublicScreen: set the public screen slider to this position to display the connection key on the public screen
taskTimeline.publicScreenForOtherTopic: The Public Screen is assigned to a different topic. By clicking on this switch, the connection key view can be activated on the public screen.

taskSettings.input: Tasks build on each other and serve as input for further tasks.
taskSettings.inputSource: Define the sources that serve as the basis for this task.
taskSettings.inputMaxCount: How many records of this source do you want to use as a basis? If no input is made, all records of the source are used.
taskSettings.inputFilter: Here you can filter the data records of the selected source according to status.
taskSettings.inputOrder: In which order should the source data be sorted for further processing? The sorting also determines the selection of the data sets if the field max count has a value.
taskSettings.inputAdd: The task can obtain source data from several sources. Click the button to add another source.
taskSettings.title: Fill in the input fields to describe the task.
taskSettings.module: Several modules are available for this task type. Select a basic module (recognisable by the round radio buttons) and any number of additional modules (recognisable by the long toggle buttons).
taskSettings.unusedModule: For reasons of simplicity, only those modules that have already been used by you are displayed by default.
taskSettings.baseModule: Click on the radio button to expand the basic module.
taskSettings.additionalModule: Activate the toggle button to activate the supplementary module.
